alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 12:57PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. John The Baptist, east central Ascension, eastern St. James and southern Livingston Parishes through 130 PM CDT... At 1256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wallace, or near Reserve, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Wallace, Edgard, South Vacherie, North Vacherie and Garyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 193 and 208. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 3 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
